游戏不错  屠夫杀不死人  人类一挂到死 直接推荐
打屠夫有助于治疗低血压，晚上尤其明显，屠夫干什么都是错的，杀人不打针对不守尸基本杀不了人，一打立马人类道德制高点就来了，建议顶配拉满，或者地下室挂机。再补充一条，新版脱缰野马给我血压打出来了，TM烧浣熊市，技能带自起图腾，起身小怀表，脱缰野马，治疗图腾，就往图书馆跑，玩个抢手，DNM！！！屠夫顶配拉满或者天龙巴布，不然不配有游戏体验，杀一个不亏，守死两个血赚。

It's obvious that the developers have no consideration for their game. There continues to be a gross imbalance in killer and survivor perks which turn each game into a sweat-fest. If you want to play this game with friends, have fun literally waiting fifteen minutes for a single match. Even by yourself the queue times are outrageous and completely take the fun away from the game. I haven't even mentioned the progression system yet. You will have to grind your ass to level each character. The currency that is rewarded for each match is so insignificant that the only way to actually level is to play during the double points event they have about three times each year. The game is littered with bugs and it breaks every time a new DLC is dropped. About the DLCs, if you were to purchase every one it would costs more than a hundred dollars. This game is a shithole and you should not consider supporting BHVR.

Actualmente no lo recomiendo si quieres ser asesino por que soy rango menor no he jugado mucho este rol y me emparejan con gente experta claramente no se disfruta para nada la experiencia de juego, si quieres jugar distintos roles pues espero que seas experto por que el emparejamiento esta muy mal hecho.

Ира нормальная в своем типпе но надо в нее играть только тогда когда твой разум и состояние для такого типпа игры готово . Если у вас полоса неудач-тильт или вы горите после 2-3 проигрышей пересмотрите свое мировозрение и понятия , если вы не можете то лутше сдесь не играть . p.s  99% pendosov токсичные и нужно это игнорировать и если вас агрят продолжайте сейвить гены  наказать токсика всегда успеете .
Jogo bom da porra, Pode compra.

It's a good game. The concept is really cool, there's a lot of different play styles and strategies that you can utilize, and it can be a lot of fun to play. However, I do have quite a few issues with it. You have to do so much grinding to get the perks that you want. Games can oftentimes be very unbalanced, especially with the new MMR system that released recently. The community can be very toxic. The amount of new content that they release is awesome, but every single time there's a major update, something in the game breaks, if not the entire game itself. It also seems like BHVR at times just doesn't listen to the community and what they want. Let me be clear, the good outweighs the bad, but there are definitely quite a few things with the game that I take issue with. If you have friends to play it with, I totally recommend giving it a try, because it's a lot of fun to play with friends. But if you're getting the game and intend on playing online with random people, there's a good chance it won't be a very fun experience.
great game to play with friends absolutely recommend it

im switching from siege to this game. honestly its a very good game and i enjoy the whole premise of trying to escape the killer's grasp by completing generators. the community is beautiful compared to siege's and i truly think there arent too many bad people here. sure you might get your match here and there of rude survivors or killers but thats not always the case! i would recommend this game highly but it does take a bit of learning for looping and mind games

Ein sehr gutes Hide and Seek Spiel (Fangen und verstecken). Man Spielt entweder als Surviver und versucht dem Killer davon zukommen indem man Generatoren repariert um das Ausgangstor mit Strom zu versorgen, oder man spielt als Killer gegen 4 Surviver, wobei man die Generatoren abläuft, diese kaputt macht und versucht die Surviver zu erwischen und der Finsternis zu opfern.

Very entertaining game that never gets boring thanks to the very frequent updates. It's not rare having discounts on dlcs, which adds lots of killers and survivors. Definitely worth of a chance.

This game is a absolute blast. Playing as killer or survivor is tons of fun, the leveling system is good fun unlocking perks for your fave character. I'd recommend this game to anyone that likes exciting multiplayer games.
